name: Cute Honey 3
description:
Cute Honey 3 is a casual strategy water catching game. How to catch liquid into the water cup is the core gameplay of this game.
The plot CG of the game will advance with the water catching game.
Various CG scenes.
Different costume props.

  • Cute and sexy two different girls.
  • Interesting and creative brush play.
  • Brand new level mechanism.
  • Thirty levels.
  • A new interactive mode.
  • A new story is waiting for your discovery.
  • Contains Japanese/Chinese full audio.

More beautiful achievements and background display pictures are waiting for you.
